crypto.name: Baby Login
crypto.desc:
I made a very secure login APIs. Please test it.
Note. I recommend that you test your exploit code locally first because it may take quite a while.

crypto.name: FactorGame
crypto.desc:
Let's play a "FactorGame"

Info: There is a 500 second timeout.

misc.name: DICE OR DIE
misc.desc:
Buy Flag!

Checks if a flag has been purchased with the given id, and if so, the flag will be displayed in the problem description.

Addition 1: The given id is different for each team.

DD Contract : 0x0A3E3E87C2B51469E56404459078e043B12e6cD6

https://dice.onchain.kr/?id=0x1a410dbdf4ba5d59e8376326649312f1c7747aa30f4e5c7f5da64c0aac1bc87b

misc.name: trends notification
misc.desc: I installed the Trends Notification smartphone app to be notified of the latest IT trends. After installing it, I realized that I couldn't use the trend notification button unless I was a paid user. This is a challenge that you, as a free user, must solve.

rev.name: Everlasting Message
rev.desc:
This binary won't stop sending messages. It seems to be trying to tell us something important...
(BGM)
* Flag is codegate2024{[found_string]}.
$ sha256sum ./messages
0356d4c29863d2c7111635c28db23790a229be56676880857d107b1076284dc3 ./messages
$ sha256sum ./flag_enc
34146e91b149fa6474e8cc2a3348329d23ed76d4b9b6611c78a2f16c2684a673 ./flag_enc
file link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1xvj706eiPD7RQ3gatCHM_mfQ8wqNblS5/view?usp=sharing

rev.name: LACUCARA VM
rev.desc: Did you know that a month ago was BASIC's 60th birthday? (Note: In Korea, a 60th birthday is called “Hwangap” and has a special meaning). To celebrate, I've created a challenge using the BASIC language. Have fun!

web.name: Chatting Service

Could you take a look?
